description.attr1: When activated, polarizes the ship's hull to boost its armor rating, doubling its effectiveness. Unlike shields armor reduces damage taken instead of negating it. However if the armor is high enough, very little to no damage might be transferred to the ship's hull and internal systems.
[colour='FFFF0000']WARNING:[colour='FFFFFFFF'] This active upgrade only boosts existing armor, this means that if the ship's armor rating is zero, then the boosted armor will also be zero.
